allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: LangGraph ReAct agent for European transportation

- Complete LangGraph ReAct agent with LangChain 1.0
- Real API integrations: Amadeus (flights), SNCF (trains), FlixBus (buses)
- Multi-city route optimization (TSP solver)
- Route analysis tool with cheapest/fastest recommendations
- MCP filesystem integration for saving itineraries
- Rich CLI interface with interactive prompts

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo create mcp-agent-transport --public --source=. --description "LangGraph ReAct agent for finding European transportation routes (flights, trains, buses) with real API integrations" --push)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add LangChain Agent Chat UI integration

- Add LangGraph API server support via langgraph-cli
- Create langgraph.json configuration file
- Add pyproject.toml for package structure
- Implement create_graph() factory function for API server
- Fix blocking call issue (removed load_dotenv from create_graph)
- Add CHAT_UI_SETUP.md with complete setup guide
- Update README.md with Chat UI link
- Add langgraph-cli to requirements.txt

Users can now interact with the agent through:
1. Web browser at https://agentchat.vercel.app
2. Local Chat UI (cloned from langchain-ai/agent-chat-ui)
3. Existing CLI interface (main.py)

Server runs at http://localhost:2024 with API docs at /docs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
